mapper.select: select * from lock_warn_info where port_id = #{portInfoId} and del_flag = 0 and status = 0 order by id desc limit 1
mapper.sql: company.name as company_name, dept.name as dept_name, equ.name as equipment_name, cabinet.name as cabinet_name, et.name as equipment_type_name, em.name as equipment_model_name, site.name as site_name, room.name as machine_room_name, equ.ip as ip, equ.community as community, temp.id as warn_info_id, pt.id as port_info_id, pt.serial_number as port_index, temp.create_time as create_time, temp.status as status

inner join lock_port_info as pt on pt.id = temp.port_id inner join lock_equipment as equ on equ.id = pt.equipment_id inner join lock_cabinet as cabinet on cabinet.id = equ.cabinet_id and cabinet.del_flag = '0' inner join lock_machine_room as room on room.id = cabinet.machine_room_id and room.del_flag = '0' inner join lock_site as site on site.id = room.site_id and site.del_flag = '0' inner join lock_dept as dept on dept.id = equ.dept_id and dept.del_flag = '0' inner join lock_equipment_type as et on et.id = equ.equipment_type_id and et.del_flag = '0' inner join lock_equipment_model as em on em.id = equ.equipment_model_id and em.del_flag = '0' inner join lock_company as company on company.id = dept.company_id and company.del_flag = '0'
